channel.title: Posts on Raw Datum
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Raw Datum

item.title: 2nd Piece: Misunderstandings and Misfortunes of AWS ELBs
item.description: Well, this is embarrassing. I’ve been working with AWS for many years now, but I will likely never claim that I know everything about any particular service and, most especially, every service offering that’s available. The velocity of change their and, really, with any modern cloud provider is crazy, and keeping up with it can be tough. But, that doesn’t excuse my not fully understanding the basic features of a fundamental piece of infrastructure there.

item.title: First Piece
item.description: Passion is an interesting concept. Everyone has a different thing or person or act that defines passion for them. In the end, though, it pretty much means the same thing: it’s what drives you. Personally. Emotionally. Maybe financially, if you’re that sort. It’s what excites you, maybe gives you a sense of purpose, or a goal to work toward. Wakes you up. Gets your attention. But does it define you?
